title: LUXURY 1 Bed/1 Bath - 850 sqft, 25min from Midtown, NO BROKER FEE
map_address: 110 Livingston Street, Apt 7R near Livingston St and Boreum Place
app_fee: $60 to run credit check and background
posting_body: ['Our spacious one-bedroom will be available for rent on September 1st.', 'The apartment is in a 24/7 full concierge building on the 7th floor facing South.', 'It includes:', '•', 'A large open concept living and dining area', '• Oversized Bedroom with his and her closets', '• Massive kitchen with top of the range appliances', '• Expansive closet space, 3 closets in total', '• Five-piece bathroom with his and her sinks, large Jacuzzi tub and separate glass enclosed shower', '•', 'In unit Bosch washer/dryer', '• Oversized soundproof windows', '• Spectacular Sub Zero refrigerator', '• Viking cooktop', '• Thermador oven', '• Dornbracht fixtures', '• Central heating and Air Conditioning', 'Building amenities include a 24-hour concierge, state-of-the-art telecommunications and satellite capabilities, on-site parking, a huge gym, expansive courtyard and a common roof deck.', '(Heat and water are included in the rent).']
